question: Which ministry Constituted 40-Member Preview Panel for International Film Festival of India(IFFI) recently?
explanation: The Information and Broadcasting Ministry (I and B) constituted a 40-member 'Preview committee' for the International Film Festival of India 2017. The I and B Ministry constituted a new 13-member steering committee and a 12-member technical committee headed by Jahnu Barua and Nagesh Kukunoor respectively. International Film Festival of India (IFFI) is scheduled to be held in Goa from 20 to 28 November 2017.
